name: Fire Prison
text:
All Dragon monsters on the field gain 300 DEF. Neither player can Link Summon a monster with a lower Link Rating than a Link Monster on the field. Monsters cannot attack, except Link Monsters. If 2 or more Cyberse Link Monsters are on the field, apply these effects.
â—? Negate the activated effects of Cyberse monsters.
â—? Cyberse monsters on the field cannot attack, monsters cannot target them for attacks, also neither player can target them with card effects.
